description: Apple on Monday unveiled iOS 26, its latest operating system for the iPhone. The update brings a new design language dubbed Liquid Glass, with more customisation options for the home and lock screen. New Apple Intelligence features have been introduced for the Phone app, while Messages, Apple Music, CarPlay, and other apps also benefit from new capabilities.
title: WWDC 2025: Apple Announces iOS 26 With New Liquid Glass Design, Apple Intelligence Enhancements and More

description: Apple has announced several Apple Intelligence features at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. These features include Live Translation, Visual Intelligence with ChatGPT, updates to Genmoji and Image Playground apps, Workout Buddy, and integration of AI to Shortcuts. Additionally, the company is also expanding Foundation Models framework to third-party app developers.
title: WWDC 2025: Apple Intelligence Models Expanded to Developers, Live Translation Feature Unveiled

description: Oppo K13x 5G is confirmed to launch in India soon. The handset will likely come with a flat display with rounded edge and could be priced under Rs. 15,000 in the country, as per a report. The phone is said to get a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and a 6,000mAh battery. It is expected to join the standard Oppo K13 5G, which was unveiled in April.
title: Oppo K13x 5G Price Range in India Tipped; Alleged Retail Box Suggests Flat Display

description: Vivo X Fold 5 will be launched in China soon. Ahead of the launch, the brand has posted teasers revealing the design and a few key specifications of the upcoming foldable. It will feature LTPO 8T panels on both the inside and outer screens. The Vivo X Fold 5 is confirmed to meet IP5X and IPX9+ ratings against dust and water ingress. It could be equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Design Teased; Confirmed to Feature 8T LTPO Panels, Meet IP5X and IPX9+ Certifications

description: Apple faces several challenges as US and European courts scrutinise its App Store fees, with even former allies questioning their validity. At the same time, President Trump has threatened a 25 percent tariff on iPhones, contributing to a steep 40 percent decline in Apple's stock this year. At the WWDC 2025, key executives from Apple are set to take the stage to connect with developers.
title: WWDC 2025: Apple Faces AI, Regulatory Challenges As it Woos Developers at Annual Conference

description: Xbox chief Phil Spencer teases the "return of a classic" in 2026 at Xbox Games Showcase on Sunday. His comments suggest Microsoft is working on a rereleasing Halo: Combat Evolved, which launched on the original Xbox in 2021.
title: Xbox Chief Phil Spencer Hints at 'Return' of Halo: Combat Evolved Next Year

description: AI+, the brand owned by NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, is reportedly planning to launch wearables. One of its debut products is said to be a smartwatch featuring built-in TWS. It will reportedly launch under the 'wearbuds' lineup and will be called the "Wearbuds Watch 3". Additionally, the report reveals the pricing of AI+ Nova 1 and Pulse 1 smartphones.
title: AI+ Smartwatch With Built-in TWS Tipped to Launch in June; Retail Box Image Leaked

description: Capcom revealed the enxt mainline Resident Evil title at Summer Game Fest on Friday. Resident Evil 9 is officially called Resident Evil Requiem, and it features a new protagonist, FBI agent Grace Ashcroft. The game will see players return to the abandoned ruins of Racoon City.
title: Capcom Reveals Resident Evil Requiem at Summer Game Fest, Launch Set for February 2026

description: Vivo T4 Ultra is set to launch in India on June 11. The company has revealed that the handset will come with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC, a 1.5K quad-curved AMOLED display, and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit, including a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter. The T4 Ultra will be available for purchase in the country via Flipkart, the Vivo India e-store and select offline retail stores.
title: Vivo T4 Ultra to Get MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC; Camera, Display Features Revealed

description: Zettai, the parent company of crypto exchange WazirX, has approached the Singapore High Court seeking a reassessment of its financial restructuring plan. The filing also requests an extension of the ongoing moratorium, which has protected both Zettai and WazirX from creditor lawsuits while the company works on its reimbursement strategy.
title: WazirX Parent Zettai Urges Singapore Court to Review WazirX Restructuring, Extend Moratorium

description: An artificial intelligence (AI)-powered drone from MavLab (TU Delft) outperformed human pilots at Abu Dhabi’s A2RL drone racing event, winning three out of four races, including the AI vs Human showdown. Competing against 13 other global teams, the autonomous drone also won the flagship 170-metre course as well as an AI-only drag race during the event.
title: AI-Powered Autonomous Drone Defeats Human Pilot at Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League

description: Lava Storm Play 5G and Storm Lite 5G handsets will launch in India on June 13. The phones will be available for purchase in the country via Amazon and the Lava India e-store. Both handsets will carry 50-megapixel dual rear camera units. The Play and Lite variants will be powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7060 and MediaTek Dimensity 6400 chipsets, respectively.
title: Lava Storm Play 5G, Storm Lite 5G India Launch Set for June 13; Design, Camera Features Teased

description: Tecno Pova 7 Ultra 5G is expected to debut later this month. While Tecno has yet to officially confirm the launch, a new leak has suggested key specifications of the upcoming Pova series phone. It is said to support magnetic wireless charging, and could pack a 6,000mAh battery along with a display offering a 144Hz refresh rate. It is also said to be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate chipset.
title: Tecno Pova 7 Ultra 5G to Reportedly Offer Magnetic Wireless Charging

description: Xbox Games Showcase was broadcast on June 8. It was a packed presentation, featrued a ton of reveals, announcements and updates on upcoming games. The next Call of Duty was teased at the event, while Atlus finally revealed the Persona 4 remake. Check out all the reveals from the Xbox Games Showcase.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Persona 4 Revival, Grounded 2 and More: Everything Announced at Xbox Games Showcase

description: Google added a new feature to AI Mode on Friday, the artificial intelligence (AI) search experience within Google Search. The new feature can create interactive graphs and charts by intelligently visualising data to help users easily understand data patterns. The Mountain View-based tech giant said the feature can be particularly useful when analysing financial data.
title: Google Search’s AI Mode Is Getting an Interactive Data Visualisation Feature

description: Meta is in talks to make a multibillion-dollar investment in Scale AI. The financing may exceed $10 billion (roughly Rs. 85,533 crore)  in value, making it one of the largest private company funding events of all time.
title: Meta Set to Throw Billions at Startup That Leads AI Data Market

description: Sam Altman's Tools for Humanity is rolling out its eyeball-scanning Orb devices to the UK. The spherical Orbs will be at dedicated premises in shopping malls and on high streets, said Damien Kieran, chief legal and privacy officer at Tools for Humanity.
title: Sam Altman’s Eyeball-Scanning Identification Tech Expands to UK

description: Circle's stock went as high as $123.49 (roughly Rs. 10,566), nearly four times its $31 (roughly Rs. 2,650) offer price and valuing the company at $32.1 (roughly Rs. 2,74,676 crore) billion on a fully diluted basis. The blockbuster listing also reinforced expectations that the IPO market was regaining its momentum after being stifled by tariff-driven volatility.
title: Stablecoin Firm Circle Adds to Stellar First Day Gains with Another Stock Surge

description: A team of cybersecurity researchers have found over 20 apps on the Google Play Store which were targeting cryptocurrency wallet users. According to a report by a cybersecurity research firm, these crypto-phishing applications impersonated legitimate crypto wallets such as Hyperliquid, PancakeSwap, and Raydium. Threat actors leveraged phishing tactics and compromised or repurposed developer accounts, forcing users to enter their 12-word mnemonic phrase in a false wallet interface and gaining access to their real wallets.
title: Cybersecurity Researchers Find 20 Crypto-Phishing Apps on Google Play Store: Check List

description: iQOO is commemorating its fifth anniversary in India by introducing offers on various smartphones. During the anniversary sale which takes place between June 9 and June 13, buyers can get their hands on the iQOO 13, iQOO 12, iQOO Neo 10, and iQOO Z10 at lower net effective prices than their usual market rates. The company says offers are valid on purchases made through the iQOO India e-Store and Amazon India website.
title: iQOO 13, iQOO Neo 10 and More Available With Discounts During Company's 5th Anniversary Sale

description: Oppo Find X9 series is expected to go official by the end of this year. The flagship lineup, which could include four models —Oppo Find X9, Find X9+, Find X9 Pro, Find X9 Ultra— has been in the rumour mill for quite some time now. Now, a Chinese tipster has leaked the camera details of the upcoming Oppo Find X9 Ultra. Oppo is said to be testing the Find X9 Ultra prototype with 50-megapixel and 200-megapixel dual-periscope sensors.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Said to Get Flat Screens; X9 Ultra Tipped to Feature Dual-Periscope Cameras

description: Poco F7 is expected to be unveiled in India soon alongside an Ultra variant. The company has begun teasing the launch of the Poco F series handsets in the country. The Indian variant of the base Poco F7 is expected to feature a larger battery than its global counterpart. Both variants could launch on the same day.
title: Poco F7 India Launch Teased; to Be Available for Purchase Via Flipkart

description: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G could be nearing its India debut. Although Vivo has yet to officially confirm the handset, key details—including its colour variants, RAM and storage configurations, and core specifications—have surfaced online. The upcoming Y-series phone is expected to launch in two colour options, with 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of storage. It will reportedly sport an AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Vivo Y400 Pro 5G May Launch in India Soon; Colour Variants, RAM and Storage Options Tipped

description: Google has added a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature to the Gemini app on iOS and Android. The feature, dubbed Scheduled Actions, will allow users to ask the chatbot to perform an action at a future date or time, and it will perform it as requested. It can also be used to set up recurring tasks, such as getting a news feed every day in the morning.
title: Gemini App Is Getting a New Scheduled Actions Feature on iOS and Android

description: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G is set to launch in India soon, with the company beginning to tease key details of the upcoming smartphone. While the exact launch date remains unconfirmed, Realme has revealed the battery capacity, along with a glimpse of the phone’s design and colour options. The company also hinted at the phone's price range. Previous leaks have hinted at its potential RAM and storage configurations.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G India Launch Teased; to Be Priced Under Rs 10,000 and Pack a 6,000mAh Battery

description: WWDC 2025 will begin on Monday, with Apple CEO Tim Cook expected to unveil numerous software updates and features coming to eligible devices. We're expecting Apple to unveil iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26, watchOS 26, tvOS 26, and visionOS 26 at the event. Unlike last year's focus on Apple Intelligence features, which have seen multiple delays, this year's keynote is unlikely to focus on AI features, according to reports.
title: WWDC 2025 Live Updates: Apple Expected to Announce iOS 26, macOS 26 and More

description: An AI-based study has found that Mars’s mysterious dark slope streaks are likely formed by dust and wind, not flowing water as long believed. Based on an analysis of over 86,000 satellite images, the findings challenge past theories and may help scientists focus future Mars missions on more promising areas in the search for ancient life.
title: AI Reveals Mars’s Mysterious Slope Streaks Likely Formed by Dust, Not Water Activity

description: Apple published a research paper on Saturday, where researchers examine the strengths and weaknesses of recently released reasoning models. Also known as large reasoning models (LRMs), these are the models that “think” by utilising additional compute to solve complex problems. However, the paper found that even the most powerful models struggle with a complexity issue.
title: Apple Claims AI Reasoning Models Suffer From ‘Accuracy Collapse’ When Solving Complex Problems

description: Apple's attempts to upgrade Siri with support for AI features has run into technical challenges, leading to multiple delays, according to a report. The company has been working on rebuilding Siri to compete with advanced AI-powered voice assistants from rivals like Google, OpenAI, and Perplexity, but it is reportedly unlikely to launch this year due to software bugs.
title: Apple's Siri Revamp Said to Be Delayed Due to Technological Challenges

description: Archaeologists from Slovakia and Guatemala have unearthed three previously unknown Maya cities in Guatemala’s Petén jungle. The sites—Los Abuelos, Petnal, and Cambrayal—feature ceremonial statues, pyramids, astronomical alignments, and advanced water engineering. Highlights include ancestral altars, a 108-foot pyramid, and a palace with a rooftop cistern. These discoveries illuminate the early evolution of Maya civilization, linking past looted artifacts to their origins and showcasing their engineering genius. The finds span nearly 1,300 years of Maya history and offer a fresh look into their complex society, rituals, and architecture.
title: Archaeologists Discover Three Lost Maya Cities in Guatemala’s Jungle

description: The overall crypto market cap underwent a slight slip by 0.16 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether saw losses on Monday, June 9 alongside Tether, Tron, and Stellar among other assets. Small gains were retained by Solana, Ripple, and Bitcoin Cash.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Trades at $105,000 as Market Consolidates, Altcoins See Small Losses

description: WWDC 2025 kicks off later today and we’re getting some last minute leaks which shed light on what’s to come. Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman says iOS 26, which is likely to be the next iteration of the iPhone operating system (OS), will feature a new interface called “liquid glass” with elements resembling the name throughout the user interface. Apple is reported to move away from the current flat design and the new UI is expected to set the stage for an overhaul of the iPhone lineup next year.
title: iOS 26 to Feature “Liquid Glass” UI Elements in Anticipation of 2027 iPhone Models: Report

description: Microsoft on Sunday announced two new handheld gaming PCs at Xbox Games Showcase. Developed in collaboration with Asus, the new ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X become the first Xbox-branded handheld devices from the company. Built for gaming on-the-go, the former is powered by a Ryzen Z2 A processor while the latter has an even more powerful AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme chipset.
title: Microsoft Unveils ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X Handheld PCs at Xbox Games Showcase

description: Samsung has been rumoured to hold a Galaxy Unpacked event next month to introduce its next-generation Galaxy Z foldable phones. While recent reports suggested that the launch event could take place in early July, a new leak claims that the timeline could be pushed slightly. The tipster suggests that Samsung may unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 around mid-July.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7 Unpacked Event Tipped to Be Held Mid-July

description: Vivo Y300c has been launched in China. The new Vivo Y series phone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, paired with 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. It is available in three colour options and features a 6.77-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The new Vivo Y300c also gets a 6,500mAh battery with 44W fast charging support.
title: Vivo Y300c With 6,500mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Dual Rear Cameras Launched: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp is said to be developing a new feature for its Android app which provides users with more control over the quality of media that is automatically downloaded on their devices. According to information shared by a feature tracker, the instant messaging platform may allow them to select between standard or high-definition (HD) quality settings. The new option was discovered in a beta version of the app and is reported to be available to some beta users.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Testing Auto-Download Quality for Photos and Videos
